required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Effect of Auditory and Motor Cognitive Distractions on the Neural Provocation Test in Subjects With Neck Pain
clinical_study.official_title: The Effect of Auditory and Motor Cognitive Distractions on the Neural Provocation Test in Subjects With Neck Pain: A Randomized Controlled Trial

brief_summary.textblock: The main objective of this research is to evaluate the influence of different distraction stimuli on neural mechano-sensitivity tests.

primary_outcome.measure: Mechanosensitivity based on range of motion
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change in pressure pain threshold immediately at the end of the intervention
primary_outcome.description: The inclinometer, an instrument characterized by the constant use of gravity as a reference point to evaluate mobility, is used to evaluate the range of nerve movement.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Change in pain intensity immediately at the end of the intervention
primary_outcome.description: It is the subjective feeling of self-reported pain ranging from 0-100 points.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Neural Stress Provoked by the Median Nerve
Neural stress provocation with cognitive auditory distraction
Providing neural stress with a motor distraction
Neural stress provocation with both distractions

intervention.description: The patient is placed in a supine position and his cervical spine with 25ยบ of lateral flexion on the opposite side of the member in which we perform the test. First a passive scapular depression is performed, 90ยบ of shoulder abduction combining external shoulder rotation. Next, a supination of the forearm is performed with wrist extension and finger extension. Finally, the elbow is extended to the limit of resistance or when the investigator observes the elevation of the shoulder girdle.
intervention.arm_group_label: Neural Stress Provoked by the Median Nerve

intervention.intervention_name: Neural stress provocation with cognitive auditory distraction
intervention.description: Neural provocation of the median nerve is performed but an auditory distraction is added with a metronome with a constant time of 50 beats per minute.
intervention.arm_group_label: Neural stress provocation with cognitive auditory distraction

intervention.intervention_name: Providing neural stress with a motor distraction
intervention.description: The neural provocation of the median nerve is performed and we add a motor distraction that consists of the patient intermittently squeezing a ball with the opposite hand.
intervention.arm_group_label: Providing neural stress with a motor distraction

intervention.intervention_name: Neural stress provocation with auditory and motor cognitive distraction.
intervention.description: The neural provocation of the median nerve is performed, we add auditory distraction with the metronome with a constant time of 50 BPM and a motor distraction consisting of squeezing a ball to the rhythm that sounds the metronome.
intervention.arm_group_label: Neural stress provocation with both distractions

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Men and women aged between 18 and 65 years
- Medical diagnosis of non specific chronic neck pain with more than 6 months of evolution of neck pain
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients with rheumatic diseases, cervical hernia, cervical whiplash syndrome, neck surgeries o a history of arthrodesis
- Systemic diseases
- Vision, hearing or vestibular problems
- Severe trauma or a traffic accident that had an impact on the cervical area.
